welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santo Cristo, a charming city nestled in the heart of the Philippines! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Santo Cristo."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device, per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
